titles.title: To extend by 19 days the authorization for the special assessment for the Domestic Trafficking Victims' Fund.
To extend by 19 days the authorization for the special assessment for the Domestic Trafficking Victims' Fund.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: This bill extends until September 30, 2022, the special assessment of $5,000 on nonindigent persons or entities convicted of certain offenses involving sexual abuse or human trafficking. Currently, the special assessment expires on September 11, 2022.
